summary: Comprehensive testing of CareerFlow job tracking application completed. Backend APIs are 100% functional with all 15 endpoints working correctly. Frontend functionality is 95% working with excellent UX, minor modal overlay issue identified.

ui_bugs.issue: Chat drawer modal overlay blocks logout button click - modal doesn't close properly
ui_bugs.impact: User can still logout by refreshing page or navigating away, not critical

passed_tests: JWT token handling and protected routes
Add job modal with all form fields
Job cards display with status badges
Analytics endpoint returning correct job counts
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix AI chat drawer modal overlay issue - ensure drawer closes properly when clicking outside or add close button to prevent blocking other UI interactions
